dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: Backport of pathlib-compatible object wrapper for zip files.
dependencies.name: py-zipp

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Modern, user-friendly command-line HTTP client for the API era.

dependent_to.description:
pipx is a tool to install and run Python applications in isolated
environments
dependent_to.name: pipx

dependent_to.description: Declarative statistical visualization library for Python
dependent_to.name: py-altair

dependent_to.description:
anndata is a Python package for handling annotated data matrices in
memory and on disk, positioned between pandas and xarray.
dependent_to.name: py-anndata

dependent_to.description: Bash tab completion for argparse.
dependent_to.name: py-argcomplete

dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.
dependent_to.name: py-asdf

dependent_to.description: Classes Without Boilerplate
dependent_to.name: py-attrs

dependent_to.description:
Auditing and relabeling of PEP 600 manylinux_x_y, PEP 513 manylinux1,
PEP 571 manylinux2010 and PEP 599 manylinux2014 Linux wheels.
dependent_to.name: py-auditwheel

dependent_to.description: Manipulate JSON-like data with NumPy-like idioms.
dependent_to.name: py-awkward

dependent_to.description:
Compatibility shim providing selectable entry points for older
implementations
dependent_to.name: py-backports-entry-points-selectable

dependent_to.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.
dependent_to.name: py-build

dependent_to.description: catalogue: Super lightweight function registries for your library.
dependent_to.name: py-catalogue

dependent_to.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependent_to.name: py-click

dependent_to.description: A CSS Cascading Style Sheets library for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-cssutils

dependent_to.description: A workflow engine for cycling systems.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-flow

dependent_to.description:
Dash is the most downloaded, trusted Python framework for building ML &
data science web apps.
dependent_to.name: py-dash

dependent_to.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.
dependent_to.name: py-dask

dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.
dependent_to.name: py-datalad

dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.
dependent_to.name: py-datasets

dependent_to.description:
deepTools addresses the challenge of handling the large amounts of data
that are now routinely generated from DNA sequencing centers.
dependent_to.name: py-deeptools

dependent_to.description: doit - Automation Tool.
dependent_to.name: py-doit

dependent_to.description: Helpful functions for Python
dependent_to.name: py-domdf-python-tools

dependent_to.description: Publications (and donations) tracer.
dependent_to.name: py-duecredit

dependent_to.description: Dynamic version generation.
dependent_to.name: py-dunamai

dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip

dependent_to.description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.
dependent_to.name: py-fiona

dependent_to.description: FireWorks stores, executes, and manages calculation workflows.
dependent_to.name: py-fireworks

dependent_to.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.
dependent_to.name: py-flake8

dependent_to.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.
dependent_to.name: py-flask

dependent_to.description: Efficient and easy Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-fluidfft

dependent_to.description: Pure-Python core library for FluidSim framework.
dependent_to.name: py-fluidsim-core

dependent_to.description:
FORD, standing for FORtran Documenter, is an automatic documentation
generator for modern Fortran programs.
dependent_to.name: py-ford

dependent_to.description:
A Language Server for Fortran providing code completion, diagnostics,
hovering and more.
dependent_to.name: py-fortls

dependent_to.description:
This project is based upon the Fortran parser originally developed by
Pearu Peterson for the F2PY project, www.f2py.com. It provides a parser
for Fortran source code (up to and including F2008) implemented purely
in Python with minimal dependencies.
dependent_to.name: py-fparser

dependent_to.description:
Python bindings and ensemble workflow management for GROMACS. The
GROMACS C++ API is affected by its package variants. You can specify a
particular GROMACS API by making the dependency variant explicit. E.g.
``spack install gmxapi ^gromacs+mpi~double``
dependent_to.name: py-gmxapi

dependent_to.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.
dependent_to.name: py-hatchling

dependent_to.description:
This modest package contains various common humanization utilities, like
turning a number into a fuzzy human readable duration ('3 minutes ago')
or into a human readable size or throughput. It works with python 2.7
and 3.3 and is localized to Russian, French, Korean and Slovak.
dependent_to.name: py-humanize

dependent_to.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter
dependent_to.name: py-ipykernel

dependent_to.description:
Differentiate, compile, and transform Numpy code. JAX is a Python
library for accelerator-oriented array computation and program
transformation, designed for high-performance numerical computing and
large-scale machine learning.
dependent_to.name: py-jax

dependent_to.description: Python library for serializing any arbitrary object graph into JSON.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonpickle

dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema

dependent_to.description: Jupyter protocol client APIs
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-client

dependent_to.description: Multi-Language Server WebSocket proxy for Jupyter Notebook/Lab server.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-lsp

dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.
dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab

dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications
dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server

dependent_to.description:
The Python keyring library provides an easy way to access the system
keyring service from python. It can be used in any application that
needs safe password storage.
dependent_to.name: py-keyring

dependent_to.description: Messaging library for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-kombu

dependent_to.description: Common Python utilities and GitHub Actions in Lightning Ecosystem
dependent_to.name: py-lightning-utilities

dependent_to.description:
A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the
existing templating languages.
dependent_to.name: py-mako

dependent_to.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.
dependent_to.name: py-markdown

dependent_to.description: MeshIO is a Python library to read and write many mesh formats.
dependent_to.name: py-meshio

dependent_to.description: Rose, a framework for meteorological suites.
dependent_to.name: py-metomi-rose

dependent_to.description:
Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.
dependent_to.name: py-metpy

dependent_to.description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs

dependent_to.description: MLflow: A Platform for ML Development and Productionization.
dependent_to.name: py-mlflow

dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.
dependent_to.name: py-multiqc

dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook Conversion
dependent_to.name: py-nbconvert

dependent_to.description: The Jupyter Notebook format
dependent_to.name: py-nbformat

dependent_to.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM
dependent_to.name: py-numba

dependent_to.description:
The Oslo configuration API supports parsing command line arguments and
.ini style configuration files.
dependent_to.name: py-oslo-config

dependent_to.description: Load, configure, and compose WSGI applications and servers
dependent_to.name: py-pastedeploy

dependent_to.description: The build backend used by PDM that supports latest packaging standards
dependent_to.name: py-pdm-backend

dependent_to.description: Wrappers to build Python packages using PEP 517 hooks.
dependent_to.name: py-pep517

dependent_to.description:
Pint is a Python package to define, operate and manipulate physical
quantities: the product of a numerical value and a unit of measurement.
It allows arithmetic operations between them and conversions from and to
different units.
dependent_to.name: py-pint

dependent_to.description: A convenience wrapper for using pint with xarray
dependent_to.name: py-pint-xarray

dependent_to.description: Plugin and hook calling mechanisms for python.
dependent_to.name: py-pluggy

dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry

dependent_to.description: Poetry PEP 517 Build Backend.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry-core

dependent_to.description:
A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit
hooks.
dependent_to.name: py-pre-commit

dependent_to.description:
PrettyTable is a simple Python library designed to make it quick and
easy to represent tabular data in visually appealing ASCII tables.
dependent_to.name: py-prettytable

dependent_to.description: Python docstring style checker.
dependent_to.name: py-pydocstyle

dependent_to.description:
The pyface project contains a toolkit-independent GUI abstraction layer,
which is used to support the "visualization" features of the Traits
package. Thus, you can write code in terms of the Traits API (views,
items, editors, etc.), and let pyface and your selected toolkit and
back-end take care of the details of displaying them.
dependent_to.name: py-pyface

dependent_to.description: pyfaidx: efficient pythonic random access to fasta subsequences
dependent_to.name: py-pyfaidx

dependent_to.description:
This project provides pylint formatters for a nice integration with
GitLab CI.
dependent_to.name: py-pylint-gitlab

dependent_to.description:
Headless chrome/chromium automation library (unofficial port of
puppeteer).
dependent_to.name: py-pyppeteer

dependent_to.description: A Python validator for SHACL.
dependent_to.name: py-pyshacl

dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest

dependent_to.description: A Python 3.7+ implementation of the Language Server Protocol.
dependent_to.name: py-python-lsp-server

dependent_to.description: A Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.
dependent_to.name: py-quart

dependent_to.description: Interpret numpy arrays as quaternionic arrays with numba acceleration
dependent_to.name: py-quaternionic

dependent_to.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-rasterio

dependent_to.description:
RDFLib is a pure Python package for working with RDF. RDFLib contains
most things you need to work with RDF, including: parsers and
serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, N-Quads, Turtle, TriX, Trig and
JSON-LD (via a plugin). a Graph interface which can be backed by any one
of a number of Store implementations store implementations for in-memory
storage and persistent storage on top of the Berkeley DB a SPARQL 1.1
implementation - supporting SPARQL 1.1 Queries and Update statements
dependent_to.name: py-rdflib

dependent_to.description: The Python interface to the Redis key-value store.
dependent_to.name: py-redis

dependent_to.description: A python script for tabular display of slurm efficiency information.
dependent_to.name: py-reportseff

dependent_to.description:
The intention of rich-click is to provide attractive help output from
click, formatted with rich, with minimal customisation required.
dependent_to.name: py-rich-click

dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.
dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf

dependent_to.description: Python implementations of commonly used sensitivity analysis methods.
dependent_to.name: py-salib

dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.
dependent_to.name: py-scanpy

dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependent_to.description:
Evaluate and transform D matrices, 3-j symbols, and (scalar or spin-
weighted) spherical harmonics
dependent_to.name: py-spherical

dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx

dependent_to.description: A Sphinx extension for BibTeX style citations.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-bibtex

dependent_to.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper
dependent_to.name: py-sqlalchemy

dependent_to.description: Various utility functions and custom data types for SQLAlchemy.
dependent_to.name: py-sqlalchemy-utils

dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-streamlit

dependent_to.description: Meta-language for DSL implementation inspired by Xtext.
dependent_to.name: py-textx

dependent_to.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.
dependent_to.name: py-tox

dependent_to.description:
A library for accelerating Transformer models on NVIDIA GPUs, including
fp8 precision on Hopper GPUs.
dependent_to.name: py-transformer-engine

dependent_to.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.
dependent_to.name: py-twine

dependent_to.description: Run-time type checker for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-typeguard

dependent_to.description:
ROOT I/O in pure Python and NumPy. Uproot is a reader and a writer of
the ROOT file format using only Python and Numpy. Unlike the standard
C++ ROOT implementation, Uproot is only an I/O library, primarily
intended to stream data into machine learning libraries in Python.
Unlike PyROOT and root_numpy, Uproot does not depend on C++ ROOT.
Instead, it uses Numpy to cast blocks of data from the ROOT file as
Numpy arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-uproot

dependent_to.description: Vector classes and utilities
dependent_to.name: py-vector

dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv

dependent_to.description:
Volumetric Data Analysis yt is a python package for analyzing and
visualizing volumetric, multi-resolution data from astrophysical
simulations, radio telescopes, and a burgeoning interdisciplinary
community.
dependent_to.name: py-yt

dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.
dependent_to.name: reframe

dependent_to.description:
Sourmash: Quickly search, compare, and analyze genomic and metagenomic
data sets with k-mer sketches.
dependent_to.name: sourmash

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
